channel.title: Guides on Briifd
channel.description: Recent content in Guides on Briifd

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Briifd is an AI-first media monitoring tool. We use ChatGPT as the interface for our AI media analyst. This guide will help you get started with Briifd and ChatGPT.

item.title: Track Your First Topic
item.description: Now that your account is set up, we can start tracking topics and search terms using the AI assistant. Simply tell the assistant what company or topic you are interested in tracking, and it will suggest the best search terms to use.

item.title: Article Analysis
item.description: One of the most powerful features of having an AI media analyst is the ability to search and filter across thousands of articles in seconds. This guide will show you how to use the AI assistant to analyze articles and extract insights.

item.title: Ad Hoc Reports
item.description: A significant time-saving feature of Briifd is the ability to create reports on demand. This guide will show you how to run ad hoc reports in Briifd and customize them to suit your needs.

item.title: Automated Reports
item.description: Automated reports are a powerful feature of Briifd that allow you to receive regular updates on the topics and search terms you are tracking. By setting up automated reports, you can stay informed about the latest news and trends in your industry without having to manually search for information.
